Uses of Package
org.nlpub.watset.graph

Packages that use org.nlpub.watset.graph
Package Description
org.nlpub.watset.eval
Clustering and performance evaluation tools.
org.nlpub.watset.graph
Graph processing and clustering.
org.nlpub.watset.util
Utility classes and helpers.
  • Classes in org.nlpub.watset.graph used by org.nlpub.watset.eval
    Class Description
    ClusteringAlgorithmBuilder
    A builder for constructing the ClusteringAlgorithm instances.
  • Classes in org.nlpub.watset.graph used by org.nlpub.watset.graph
    Class Description
    ChineseWhispers
    Implementation of the Chinese Whispers algorithm.
    ChineseWhispers.Builder
    Builder for ChineseWhispers.
    ClusteringAlgorithmBuilder
    A builder for constructing the ClusteringAlgorithm instances.
    ComponentsClustering
    A trivial clustering algorithm that treats every connected component as a cluster.
    ComponentsClustering.Builder
    Builder for ComponentsClustering.
    EmptyClustering
    A trivial clustering algorithm that returns no clusters.
    EmptyClustering.Builder
    Builder for EmptyClustering.
    MarkovClustering
    Naïve implementation of the Markov Clustering (MCL) algorithm.
    MarkovClustering.Builder
    Builder for MarkovClustering.
    MarkovClustering.InflateVisitor
    Visitor that raises each element to the power of MarkovClustering.r.
    MarkovClusteringExternal
    A wrapper for the official implementation of the Markov Clustering (MCL) algorithm in C.
    MarkovClusteringExternal.Builder
    Builder for MarkovClusteringExternal.
    MaxMax
    Implementation of the MaxMax soft clustering algorithm.
    MaxMax.Builder
    Builder for MaxMax.
    MaxMaxClustering
    A MaxMax clustering.
    NodeWeighting
    Node weighting for Chinese Whispers.
    NodeWeightings.WeightingMode
    Weighting modes.
    SenseInduction
    A simple graph-based word sense induction approach that clusters node neighborhoods.
    SimplifiedWatset
    A faster and simplified version of Watset that does not need a context similarity measure.
    SimplifiedWatset.Builder
    Builder for SimplifiedWatset.
    SingletonClustering
    A trivial clustering algorithm that puts every node in a separate cluster.
    SingletonClustering.Builder
    Builder for SingletonClustering.
    TogetherClustering
    A trivial clustering algorithm that puts every node together in a single large cluster.
    TogetherClustering.Builder
    Builder for TogetherClustering.
    Watset
    Deprecated.
    Replaced with SimplifiedWatset
    Watset.Builder
    Deprecated.
    Builder for Watset.
    WatsetClustering
    A Watset clustering.
  • Classes in org.nlpub.watset.graph used by org.nlpub.watset.util
    Class Description
    ClusteringAlgorithmBuilder
    A builder for constructing the ClusteringAlgorithm instances.
